qas.question: When was Madonna's first concert tour in North America?
Who were the opening act for Madonna's concert The Virgin tour?
When did Madonna have nude photos taken of her in New York?
How much was Madonna's nude photos were finally sold for?
When was the Live Aid Charity Concert held?

context: <a0_0>Beginning in April 1985<a0_0/>, Madonna embarked on her first concert tour in North America, The Virgin Tour, with the <a1_0>Beastie Boys<a1_0/> as her opening act. She progressed from playing CBGB and the Mudd Club to playing large sporting arenas. At that time she released two more hit singles from the album, "Angel" and "Dress You Up". In July, Penthouse and Playboy magazines published a number of nude photos of Madonna, taken in New York in <a2_0>1978<a2_0/>. She had posed for the photographs as she needed money at the time, and was paid as little as $25 a session. The publication of the photos caused a media uproar, but Madonna remained "unapologetic and defiant". The photographs were ultimately sold for <a3_0>up to $100,000<a3_0/>. She referred to these events at the <a4_0>1985<a4_0/> outdoor Live Aid charity concert, saying that she would not take her jacket off because "[the media] might hold it against me ten years from now."
